item.description:
The Wedeln Ski and Outdoor Club is part of a combined group of clubs call the Eastern Inter-Club Ski League (EICSL). This group sponsors ski/snowboard races, social events, lift ticket and vendor discounts and many other perks for its member clubs. This event, at F1 in Braintree, will give you the opportunity to meet Wedeln members and members of many other clubs. This is a great way to learn about the fabulous and friendly clubs that make up the EICSL family.

I will actually be at Ski Fitness training in Waltham. Look for Wedeln members Pam, Peter and Flounder - they should be wearing some "Wedeln" shirts or hats.
item.name: Meet the EICSL Ski Clubs at F1
